mapper.select: SELECT NAME AS "userName", MM.ID AS "userId", MM.COMPANY_CODE AS "cmCode", MM.DEPARTMENT_CODE AS "mmdpCode", DP.COMPANY_CODE AS "dpCmCode", DP.DEPARTMENT_CODE AS "dpCode" FROM MM INNER JOIN DP ON MM.DEPARTMENT_CODE = DP.DEPARTMENT_CODE AND MM.COMPANY_CODE = DP.COMPANY_CODE WHERE MM.COMPANY_CODE = #{cmCode} AND MM.DEPARTMENT_CODE = #{dpCode} AND MM.ID NOT LIKE #{userId}
